channel.title: DDs special attack "thing"
channel.description:
ok... you know how the dds special on most servers like.... the red line moves toward the enemy... well i was wondering if anyone knew which files i needed to change, and what i needed to look for in the files that way it would be like the ones in RS.
- Thanks, Gh0st Jr

item.title: DDs special attack "thing"
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

Search for the ID of the DDS in your class client and change the animation.

Read full topic
